localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Bold is a hosted, headless CMS SaaS application that empowers publishers to create, curate and distribute their content across modern devices and screens effortlessly through structured APIs using any technology stack.
blogPost.body: Bold is a hosted, headless CMS SaaS application that empowers publishers to create, curate and distribute their content across modern devices and screens effortlessly through structured APIs using any technology stack.
blogPost.title: Bold CMS - The CMS that understands your content
blogPost.author: Quintype

localize.description: Bold是一个托管的无头CMS SaaS应用程序，它使出版商能够使用任何技术栈，通过结构化的API在现代设备和屏幕上毫不费力地创建、策划和发布他们的内容。
Bold是一個託管的無頭CMS SaaS應用程序，它使出版商能夠使用任何技術棧，通過結構化的API在現代設備和屏幕上毫不費力地創建、策劃和發佈他們的內容。

previous.excerpt: With WhatsApp Actions, it is now possible to send messages to your contacts on WhatsApp right from your Hubspot workflows.
previous.title: WhatsApp Actions for HubSpot - Send WhatsApp messages from HubSpot workflows

localize.description: 有了 WhatsApp Actions，现在可以直接从 Hubspot 工作流向 WhatsApp 上的联系人发送消息。
有了 WhatsApp Actions，現在可以直接從 Hubspot 工作流向 WhatsApp 上的聯繫人發送消息。

next.excerpt: See who viewed your content instantly. Along with total view count, you can also see the total percentage viewed by users on screen recordings, videos, and images. These analytics will allow you to focus on creating content with higher engagement
next.title: Analytics from CloudApp - See who’s watching and engaging with your content

localize.description: 即时查看谁浏览了你的内容。除了总浏览次数，你还可以看到用户对屏幕录像、视频和图片的总浏览百分比。这些分析可以让你专注于创建具有更高参与度的内容。
localize.tagline: 查看谁在观看和参与你的内容。

localize.description: 即時查看誰瀏覽了你的內容。除了總瀏覽次數，你還可以看到用戶對屏幕錄像、視頻和圖片的總瀏覽百分比。這些分析可以讓你專注於創建具有更高參與度的內容。
localize.tagline: 查看誰在觀看和參與你的內容。
